column5: Well its late, and I can't sleep so I thought I would put up some pics.  Hope you enjoy.  These first ones are from a while back, Cat Island, Bahamas.  My feet burt really badly the day before, thats why I'm wearing socks!      Double Header   Me fighting the shark       These ones are from St. Martin...40lbs   My dad caught this one..about 80lbs   Florida Redfish   Lake Nipissing walleye
great pics! thanks for sharing.  how long did it take to bring the shark in? must have been exhausted after the fight!!
Of all the lines it had to hit, it had to be the lightest....when it was all said and done it took close to 3 hours.
Wow thats such a long fight. Nice Pictures.
Nice pics!!!.... I guess your not a Broncos fan though eh? LOL  Thanks for sharing! G
Amazing pics!  3 hours?  Must have been an adrenaline rush the whole time!!!
some nice pics, i have always wanted to catch one of those reds.

Hey, I've been to Cat Island!  Did you stay on the island, or just take a charter down there to fish?  Awesome fishing down there....I only brought a lightweight rod and fished the tidal creeks...had some incredible action....even hooked one of those nice reef sharks!  Nice pics and thanks for sharing

I was so pumped when the shark hit, we thought it was a marlin at first by the way it ran.  But soon enough we found out what it really was.  Towards the end I was getting really tired.  I have a friend who has a place down near Hawks Nest.  He has a deal worked out with them that he can use the facilities when he comes down.  Oh I almost forgot....GO BRONCOS!!!
